turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a coffee at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where would you like me to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you go to the one nearby, on Cedar and Ashlan?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a caramel brulee latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They normally ask if you want whip cream with it. Do you want whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes but tell them to add a little chocolate sauce to the cup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I will let them know to add chocolate sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I also get it with almond milk instead of regular milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I can let them know to do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also want an espresso shot added since today is going to be a longer day for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will have them add an espresso shot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also want to get a caffe mocha grande too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I will add that to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get it soon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes the order has been placed at the Starbucks on Cedar and Ashlan to get a Venti Caramel Brulee latte. You want it with extra whip cream, almond milk, chocolate sauce, and with an added espresso shot. I also have a caffe mocha grande hot. Your receipt will be in your email.
